text: "The Monster" is a 2013 song by American rapper Eminem featuring Barbadian singer Rihanna and is the fourth single from his 8th studio album The Marshall Mathers LP 2. It topped the single charts in Australia, Canada, the Czech Republic, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Slovakia, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, the United Kingdom and the United States. It went to number 2 in Belgium, Denmark and Hungary, number 3 in Germany and the Netherlands, number 5 in Italy and number 6 in Austria. The song was nominated for three MTV Video Music Awards in 2014. Category:2013 songs Category:Eminem songs Category:Rihanna songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: The Monster (song)
